43245.name: Abominable Bowman
43245.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random friendly Beast that died this game.
43245.flavorText: Frosty the Bowman... was an angry hateful soul... with a fresh hewn bow and a missing nose...

42773.name: Acherus Veteran
42773.flavorText: This is my Runeblade. There are many like it but this one is mine.

42596.name: Acolyte of Agony
42596.flavorText: It takes many years of practiced study in order to fully master agony.

42810.name: Animated Berserker
42810.text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to it.
42810.flavorText: He'd be a lot easier to animate if he would just stand still.

42633.name: Archbishop Benedictus
42633.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a copy of your opponent's deck into your deck.

45366.name: Arfus
45366.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Lich King card to your hand.
45366.flavorText: There must always be a Lick King.

42462.name: Arrogant Crusader
42462.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
42462.flavorText: To be honest, he was kind of a jerk even BEFORE he was bitten by that ghoul.

42747.name: Avalanche
42747.text: Freeze a minion and deal 3 damage to adjacent ones.
42747.flavorText: One of our more snowbally cards.

42825.name: Blackguard
42825.text: Whenever your hero is healed, deal that much damage to a random enemy minion.
42825.flavorText: "Did I ever tell you the story of when I single-handedly took down a 29/29 C'thun?" - Reno Jackson

42700.name: Blood Razor
42700.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
42700.flavorText: For the close shave that you've always wanted. Caution: Very sharp.

43064.name: Blood-Queen Lana'thel
43064.text: Lifesteal Has +1 Attack for each card you've discarded this game.
43064.flavorText: As a young blood-princess she learned the proper way for a lady to curtsy, how to address fellow members of royalty, and how to bite them.

43415.name: Bloodreaver Gul'dan
43415.text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly Demons that died this game.
43415.flavorText: "Still you refuse to bend your knee? None can escape death, you old fool. And in death… all will serve me…"

45329.name: Bloodworm
45329.flavorText: Queen Lana'thel insists on one of these, fried, every morning for breakfast.

45392.name: Bolvar, Fireblood
45392.text: Divine Shield After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +2 Attack.

42712.name: Bone Baron
42712.text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Skeletons to your hand.

42439.name: Bone Drake
42439.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Dragon to your hand.
42439.flavorText: The bone drake brings all the dragons to the yard. He would teach you, but you have no cards.

42790.name: Bonemare
42790.flavorText: Attacks her job with unbridled enthusiasm.

43502.name: Breath of Sindragosa
43502.text: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy minion and Freeze it.
43502.flavorText: Is it cold in here or is it just Sindragosa?

43505.name: Bring It On!
43505.text: Gain 10 Armor. Reduce the Cost of minions in your opponent's hand by (2).
43505.flavorText: Brrr, it's cold in here. Let's hope she doesn't have an Auctioneer!

42678.name: Brrrloc
42678.flavorText: He may be frozen fish, but he fights fresh!

43127.name: Chillblade Champion
43127.flavorText: It slices, it dices, it vaporizes! The Chillblade will make a Champion out of even the lowliest gnome.

42442.name: Cobalt Scalebane
42442.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +3 Attack.
42442.flavorText: You get a sword! And you get a sword! Everybody gets a sword!

42836.name: Coldwraith
42836.text: Battlecry: If an enemy is Frozen, draw a card.

42909.name: Corpse Raiser
42909.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
42909.flavorText: He was just minding his business, farming corpses, when you meddling adventurers came along.

42822.name: Corpse Widow
42822.flavorText: Her marriage survived death, but it decayed pretty quickly after that.

46102.name: Corpsetaker
46102.text: Battlecry: Gain Taunt if your deck has a Taunt minion. Repeat for Divine Shield, Lifesteal, Windfury.
46102.flavorText: Her extensive collection of corpses includes one of nearly every type. She'd love for you to join it.

42676.name: Cryostasis
42676.flavorText: We'll thaw you out when we find a cure!

43025.name: Crypt Lord
43025.text: Taunt After you summon a minion, gain +1 Health.

42469.name: Dark Conviction
42469.text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
42469.flavorText: In his court, Uther is judge, jury, AND executioner…

42766.name: Dead Man's Hand
42766.text: Shuffle a copy of your hand into your deck.
42766.flavorText: I got two pair, Rags and Armorsmiths. What you got?

42663.name: Deadscale Knight
42663.flavorText: His favorite spell is Chum Explosion.

42392.name: Death Revenant
42392.flavorText: How's everyone doing? Hurt? Bleeding? Wounded? ... Excellent.

43029.name: Deathaxe Punisher
43029.text: Battlecry: Give a random Lifesteal minion in your hand +2/+2.

42394.name: Deathspeaker
42394.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Immune this turn.
42394.flavorText: It helps to speak really, really loud.

43398.name: Deathstalker Rexxar
43398.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
43398.flavorText: "You were too slow, old friend. The hunt began long ago. And now... it will never end."

42471.name: Defile
42471.text: Deal 1 damage to all minions. If any die, cast this again.
42471.flavorText: This spell was originally designed to help warlocks clean up their hard drives.

42824.name: Desperate Stand
42824.text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Return this to life with 1 Health."
42824.flavorText: They're grateful for the help, but most minions would prefer not dying in the first place.

42743.name: Despicable Dreadlord
42743.text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.

42566.name: Devour Mind
42566.text: Copy 3 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
42566.flavorText: A mind is a terrible thing to waste. Seconds, anyone?

42756.name: Doomed Apprentice
42756.flavorText: Jaina was never good at keeping up apprentices.

42801.name: Doomerang
42801.text: Throw your weapon at a minion. It deals its damage, then returns to your hand.
42801.flavorText: Guaranteed to return your weapon directly to your hand! (Wear gloves. Thick ones.)

42658.name: Drain Soul
42658.flavorText: Cleans even the toughest clogs with just a flick of the wrist!

42750.name: Drakkari Defender
42750.flavorText: Sometimes, the best defense is an offensive troll.

45309.name: Drakkari Enchanter
45309.text: Your end of turn effects trigger twice.
45309.flavorText: Drakkari sorceresses have the irritating habit of repeating themselves at the end of every sentence. Every sentence.

42651.name: Druid of the Swarm
42651.text: Choose One - Transform into a 1/2 with Poisonous; or a 1/5 with Taunt.
42651.flavorText: The druid awoke from troubling dreams to find herself transformed into a giant spider.

45308.name: Embrace Darkness
45308.text: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, gain control of it.
45308.flavorText: Once you both get comfortable, darkness is actually pretty snuggly.

42597.name: Eternal Servitude
42597.text: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Summon it.
42597.flavorText: What do you mean I don't get overtime pay for this?!

42320.name: Exploding Bloatbat
42320.text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
42320.flavorText: We've all been there after a night of one-too-many funnel cakes.

42777.name: Fallen Sun Cleric
42777.flavorText: It's hard to keep a Shattered Sun Cleric down.

42615.name: Fatespinner
42615.text: Choose a Deathrattle (Secretly) - Deal 3 damage to all minions; or Give them +2/+2.
42615.flavorText: Her clothing? Pure silk, of course.

42998.name: Forge of Souls
42998.flavorText: Powerful weaponry forged by Bronjahm, the Godfather of Souls.

43419.name: Frost Lich Jaina
43419.text: Battlecry: Summon a 3/6 Water Elemental. Your Elementals have Lifesteal this game.
43419.flavorText: "Arthas was a spoiled child, playing with toys he could neither control nor understand. Come into the cold. I will show you the true power of the Frozen Throne."

42754.name: Frozen Clone
42754.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, add two copies of it to your hand.
42754.flavorText: It's like déjà vu, times two.

42779.name: Furnacefire Colossus
42779.text: Battlecry: Discard all weapons from your hand and gain their stats.
42779.flavorText: Smelts in his mouth, not in your hand.

42718.name: Ghastly Conjurer
42718.text: Battlecry: Add a 'Mirror Image' spell to your hand.
42718.flavorText: Wearing purple after the holidays? GHASTLY!

42760.name: Glacial Mysteries
42760.text: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
42760.flavorText: The secret is in the frosting.

42748.name: Gnash
42748.text: Give your hero +3 Attack this turn. Gain 3 Armor.
42748.flavorText: It's rude to gnash with your mouth open.

42670.name: Gnomeferatu
42670.text: Battlecry: Remove the top card of your opponent's deck.

42780.name: Grave Shambler
42780.text: Whenever your weapon is destroyed, gain +1/+1.
42780.flavorText: I think one of the necromancers got a little carried away.

43439.name: Hadronox
43439.text: Deathrattle: Summon your Taunt minions that died this game.
43439.flavorText: The viziers of Azjol-Nerub released Hadronox as a last-ditch effort to hold back the Lich King. They did so by VERY carefully scooping him up in a LARGE newspaper and releasing him.

42783.name: Happy Ghoul
42783.text: Costs (0) if your hero was healed this turn.

42642.name: Howlfiend
42642.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, discard a random card.
42642.flavorText: The problem is that he carries those cards in his mouth.

42948.name: Howling Commander
42948.text: Battlecry: Draw a Divine Shield minion from your deck.
42948.flavorText: Enlistment in her battalion comes with several pairs of earplugs.

45377.name: Hyldnir Frostrider
45377.flavorText: Don't be fooled, that polar bear's the one in charge.

42808.name: Ice Breaker
42808.text: Destroy any Frozen minion damaged by this.
42808.flavorText: A great way to end a conversation.

42763.name: Ice Fishing
42763.flavorText: Glow fish, war fish... blow fish, more fish...

42716.name: Ice Walker
42716.text: Your Hero Power also Freezes the target.
42716.flavorText: Ice Walker you say? He doesn't have feet!

46101.name: Keening Banshee
46101.text: Whenever you play a card, remove the top 3 cards of your deck.
46101.flavorText: "What are your strengths?" the interviewer asked. "Well," she replied, "I'm really good at keening."

42665.name: Leeching Poison
42665.flavorText: No actual leeches were harmed in the creation of this card.

42735.name: Light's Sorrow
42735.text: After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +1 Attack.

43031.name: Lilian Voss
43031.text: Battlecry: Replace spells in your hand with random spells (from your opponent's class).
43031.flavorText: She doesn't feel pity, or remorse, or fear. And she absolutely will not stop... ever, until all necromancers are dead.

43417.name: Malfurion the Pestilent
43417.text: Choose One - Summon 2 Poisonous Spiders; or 2 Scarabs with Taunt.
43417.flavorText: "Cenarius once taught me about the precarious balance between life and death. I have come to understand: there IS no balance. Death always wins."

43051.name: Meat Wagon
43051.text: Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck with less Attack than this minion.

45314.name: Mindbreaker
45314.flavorText: He's a mind breaker, dream taker, ghoul trainer, don't you mess around with him.

43072.name: Moorabi
43072.text: Whenever another minion is Frozen, add a copy of it to your hand.
43072.flavorText: Most disturbing is how Moorabi covers all those frozen minions with flavored syrup.

42698.name: Mountainfire Armor
42698.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, gain 6 Armor.
42698.flavorText: Excuse me. Your mountain is on fire.

45307.name: Necrotic Geist
45307.text: Whenever one of your other minions dies, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
45307.flavorText: An eye for an eye, and a ghoul for a ghoul.

42445.name: Night Howler
42445.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +2 Attack.
42445.flavorText: Honestly, he howls during the day, too.

42598.name: Obsidian Statue
42598.text: Taunt, Lifesteal Deathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
42598.flavorText: The original artist spent many hours with a fine chisel perfecting the facial expression for maximum tauntiness.

42327.name: Phantom Freebooter
42327.text: Battlecry: Gain stats equal to your weapon's.
42327.flavorText: There's no such thing as a free boot.

43028.name: Plague Scientist
43028.flavorText: The excruciating pain means it's working!

45340.name: Prince Keleseth
45340.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 2-Cost cards, give all minions in your deck +1/+1.
45340.flavorText: Three Princes stand before you. This one wants to buff his brothers.

45341.name: Prince Taldaram
45341.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 3-Cost cards, transform into a 3/3 copy of a minion.
45341.flavorText: Three Princes stand before you. This one wants to copy others.

45342.name: Prince Valanar
45342.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 4-Cost cards, gain Lifesteal and Taunt.
45342.flavorText: Three Princes stand before you. This one devours one after another.

42563.name: Professor Putricide
42563.text: After you play a Secret, put a random Hunter Secret into the battlefield.
42563.flavorText: Among his more notable inventions: A tentacle-groomer, a plague that would wipe out all life on Azeroth, and a fidget spinner.

42422.name: Rattling Rascal
42422.text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Skeleton. Deathrattle: Summon one for your opponent.

42467.name: Righteous Protector
42467.flavorText: Original name was Tubular Protector, but this seems more bodacious.

42560.name: Roll the Bones
42560.text: Draw a card. If it has Deathrattle, cast this again.

42630.name: Rotface
42630.text: After this minion survives damage, summon a random Legendary minion.
42630.flavorText: Daddy! I think I made a Legendary!

42819.name: Runeforge Haunter
42819.text: During your turn, your weapon doesn't lose Durability.
42819.flavorText: Don't worry, he'll keep an eye on that for you.

45321.name: Sanguine Reveler
45321.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion and gain +2/+2.
45321.flavorText: Have some! This drink is to die for!

42395.name: Saronite Chain Gang
42395.text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.

43423.name: Scourgelord Garrosh
43423.text: Battlecry: Equip a 4/3 Shadowmourne that also damages adjacent minions.
43423.flavorText: "You dare to challenge me? Come! Draw your last breath - and then, you are mine."

42574.name: Shadow Ascendant
42574.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1/+1.
42574.flavorText: When you're at the bottom, there's nowhere to ascend, but up.

42804.name: Shadow Essence
42804.text: Summon a 5/5 copy of a random minion in your deck.
42804.flavorText: Difficult to bottle up and sell. But it packs a punch.

43408.name: Shadowreaper Anduin
43408.text: Battlecry: Destroy all minions with 5 or more Attack.
43408.flavorText: "I will tell you what Velen never taught me. Whosoever stands before the Light… inevitably casts a shadow."

42785.name: Shallow Gravedigger
42785.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Deathrattle minion to your hand.
42785.flavorText: It's hard to put them six feet under when you're three feet tall.

43193.name: Simulacrum
43193.text: Copy the lowest Cost minion in your hand.
43193.flavorText: It's like déjà vu, times two.

43506.name: Sindragosa
43506.flavorText: "I recognize your effort but I think your magic still has room for improvement." - Sindragosa after taking a class on giving constructive feedback.

42328.name: Skelemancer
42328.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon an 8/8 Skeleton.
42328.flavorText: What do you mean there's no such thing as "Skelemancy?" But "Dinomancy" is ok?

42784.name: Skulking Geist
42784.text: Battlecry: Destroy all 1-Cost spells in both hands and decks.
42784.flavorText: It's as though a million Jade Idols cried out, and were suddenly silenced.

42338.name: Snowflipper Penguin
42338.flavorText: On land, a group of penguins is called a "waddle."

42765.name: Snowfury Giant
42765.text: Costs (1) less for each Mana Crystal you've Overloaded this game.
42765.flavorText: This minion goes all the way to 11!

45975.name: Spectral Pillager
45975.text: Combo: Deal 2 damage to a minion for each other card you've played this turn.
45975.flavorText: It turns out you CAN take it with you.

45378.name: Spellweaver
45378.flavorText: Spells offer twice the moisture wicking of cotton.

42992.name: Spirit Lash
42992.flavorText: We've got spirit, yes we do! We've got spirit, stolen from you!

42656.name: Spreading Plague
42656.text: Summon a 1/5 Scarab with Taunt. If your opponent has more minions, cast this again.
42656.flavorText: In the past, plagues were spread by mice or fleas. These days they're spread by elves.

42707.name: Stitched Tracker
42707.text: Battlecry: Discover a copy of a minion in your deck.
42707.flavorText: He's just exercising his right to bear arms.

43022.name: Strongshell Scavenger
43022.flavorText: It isn't "grave robbing" when there's no grave. It's just scavenging…

42440.name: Sunborne Val'kyr
42440.flavorText: Bring valor to Odyn's halls, Champion!

46103.name: Tainted Zealot
46103.flavorText: The love she shares seems to go nowhere. Now she's lost her Light, tosses and turns, she can't sleep at night...

42818.name: The Lich King
42818.text: Taunt At the end of your turn, add a random Lich King card to your hand.
42818.flavorText: "All that I am: anger, cruelty, vengeance, 8 attack - I bestow upon you, my chosen knight."

42987.name: Thrall, Deathseer
42987.text: Battlecry: Transform your minions into random ones that cost (2) more.
42987.flavorText: "Do not be afraid. Approach. The dead will sleep… for now."

42782.name: Ticking Abomination
42782.flavorText: Abomination. Emphasis on the second syllable.

42781.name: Tomb Lurker
42781.text: Battlecry: Add a random Deathrattle minion that died this game to your hand.
42781.flavorText: She hangs out in all the tombs, but she rarely posts.

42648.name: Toxic Arrow
42648.text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it survives, give it Poisonous.
42648.flavorText: What doesn't kill you makes you toxic.

42565.name: Treachery
42565.text: Choose a friendly minion and give it to your opponent.
42565.flavorText: Never look a gift minion in the mouth.

42775.name: Tuskarr Fisherman
42775.flavorText: If you bring him 500 fish, he'll give you this sweet Kalu'ak Fishing Pole.

42759.name: Ultimate Infestation
42759.text: Deal 5 damage. Draw 5 cards. Gain 5 Armor. Summon a 5/5 Ghoul.
42759.flavorText: Ghouls in the pipe, five by five.

42391.name: Unwilling Sacrifice
42391.text: Choose a friendly minion. Destroy it and a random enemy minion.
42391.flavorText: Stand right... there. Perfect, perfect! Now don't move.

43406.name: Uther of the Ebon Blade
43406.flavorText: "Step forward. Confess! Once I was a mere servant of the Light. Now I alone stand in judgement."

42671.name: Val'kyr Soulclaimer
42671.text: After this minion survives damage, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
42671.flavorText: My Ghoul friend is back and you're gonna be in trouble.

43392.name: Valeera the Hollow
43392.flavorText: "Run away. Hide in your precious keeps, behind your walls and your bodyguards. Night always falls, and shadows will fill your hallowed halls. One day, one of those shadows will be me."

42446.name: Venomancer
42446.flavorText: Eight times the death of regular-mancers.

42525.name: Venomstrike Trap
42525.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon a 2/3 Poisonous Cobra.

42762.name: Voodoo Hexxer
42762.text: Taunt Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
42762.flavorText: The Silver Hand recruits shuddered in terror when they saw the dreaded totem of the Hexxer: A tiny little snowman, impaled with pins.

42714.name: Vryghoul
42714.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
42714.flavorText: It's pronounced VERY GHOUL. Don't let anyone tell you different.

42649.name: Webweave
42649.flavorText: O, what a tangled web we weave, hoping spiders dodge the cleave.

45328.name: Wicked Skeleton
45328.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each minion that died this turn.
45328.flavorText: It's minions like these that give normal, law-abiding skeletons a bad rap.

42398.name: Wretched Tiller
42398.text: Whenever this minion attacks, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
42398.flavorText: If you ever tried to plow permafrost, you’d be wretched, too.
